verses.roman:
atha kāla upāvṛtte
kumāraḥ samajāyata
janayan śūrasenānāṁ
śṛṇvatāṁ paramāṁ mudam

synonyms: atha—thereafter; kāle upāvṛtte—in due course of time; kumāraḥ—the son; samajāyata—took birth; janayan—creating; śūrasenānām—of the inhabitants of Śūrasena; śṛṇvatām—hearing; paramām—the highest; mudam—delight.
translation: Thereafter, in due course of time, a son was born to the King. Hearing news of this, all the inhabitants of the state of Śūrasena were extremely pleased.
